name: Sayak Sarkar
body:
### Howdy Visitor!

Thanks for coming by my humble abode. As you can see, it's pretty empty at the moment and still needs a lot of work. 

However, the good news is that I'm already going through the furnishings and deciding upon which ones to order. Hopefully, this would be complete pretty soon and the furnishings would start arriving within a few days. (I Hope!)

In the meanwhile you can go through the following links if you are interested in knowing more about me:-

* [Blog](http://sayaksarkar.wordpress.com)
* [GitHub](https://github.com/sayak-sarkar/)
* [Linkedin](in.linkedin.com/in/sayaksarkar/)
* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/sayak_sarkar)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
